Body: Hi maxbbb,  I think you are seriously misunderstanding many aspects of our project. So let me explain. First of all, we are not a MOOC. We are and will be developing AI-algorithm based assessment and intelligent feedback generation applications (this our Dynamic Marking System). And our team with our course admins, who we are in the process of recruiting and expanding to cover different topics and education systems, have significant years of teaching and tutoring experiences, and will provide the required questions, answers, and feedbacks that will be put into our AI database to power the aforementioned Adaptive AI Assessment and Dynamic Marking System so that our AI system will help teachers and tutors accurately assess the learner's proficiency levels and provide appropriate feedbacks for the learners to work on their weaknesses. However, we will have a content-oriented product that is called Adaptive Video Technology that we plan to develop within 2019. The Adaptive Video Technology is basically a library of educational videos that will have multiple videos teaching the same topic in different ways so that the AI machine will present educational videos that matches the learner's learning needs and style correctly. The contents of our Adaptive Video Technology will be built either internally, by license and/or through partnerships with contents creators. We already started contacting potential partners in this area and will announce them as they happen. However, public forums or chatting sites always have the problem of spams that the moderator cannot control, and it is a way of life these days I guess. Body: Hi FunnyAttitude,  We will not represent the other blockchain projects that issue their own tokens to be used on their platform as your question concerns every such platform. The purpose of our token issuance is four-fold, let us try our best to explain: 1. We are using the ICO to raise our development fund. 2. By introducing our own token, we can create various token reward programs that will help develop, expand and improve our platform including but not limited to rewarding activities helping develop our AI Database or improving our platform, products and services on our platform. Also we can introduce various discount (like the 50%-off when purchasing our AI products) programs to not only promote our products, but also incentivize the usage of tokens on our platform. 3. By introducing our own token, we can set up the GoGreenFund which is endowing not cash-based scholarships, but our-token-based scholarships, and recipients who have financial difficulties can use them to buy products and services on our platform; hence contributing to equal learning chances. 4. We created an innovative Embedded Put Option through which we intend to incentivize the holding of our tokens and hence stabilize the value of our tokens. How this works? We will fix the value of our tokens when purchasing AI products at Max[token ICO end value, token current market value] So by this formula, the token value when purchasing AI products won't drop below the token ICO end value even if the token's market value drops below the ICO end value. This option combined with our 50% discount for token transactions of AI products will keep the token value when purchasing AI products always above twice as high as the token's market value. This is a bit complicated and for actual example, please visit our webpage's FAQ.  So as you can see these measures wouldn't have been possible without issuing our own token and that's why we chose blockchain and to leverage its token mechanism. Thanks for the great question^^  Best, BitSchool

Body: Hi FunnyAttitude,  Totally right, as our BSCH is tied to ETH, that situation can happen and vice versa. But I think this is the same for any financial instruments. For instance, IPOs have the same movement issues and that's why people invest in stocks actually...to capture the upturn. And when the market turns the other way, people loose money. This is why companies adopt hedging mechanisms and that's how investment banks earn their fees. The same logic applies to coins (although whether to treat coin as securities or currency is uncertain in some countries and even those which implement some kind of regulations, they differ) and we will have to plan some hedging mechanisms so that a significant drop in our coin's market value would not negatively affect our development plans. However, as you mentioned, if our coin triples, it might be a possibility that we will have more fund than we need, but it would be better than having less. Also even in that case, like I mentioned, we have to prepare for any potential drop in the coin's value, again, so that it would not hamper our development roadmap. One aspect we implemented to help stabilize our coin value is our Embedded Put Option and the 50% discounts extended to our AI products. When we designed this measure we hoped it would help to keep our coin's value stable even during times when our token's market value drops significantly. FunnyAttitude, if you have any good ideas to stabilize the coin value, it would be real nice if you could share them with us^^; Would be an interesting discussion.  Best, BitSchool

Body: Hi BlockFolksHQ,  First of all, thx for your interest and we're totally agreeing to your view that 'this deserve more views and awareness. It is a great project'. Especially as our model integrates the tutoring platform, the subjects will actually depend on what customers are looking for and what our tutors can provide. The insights on subjects will be integrated in our AI product as well.  2. Our platform is built upon Artificial Intelligence technology (AI) and will address the whole cycle of educational process from assessing the student's current proficiency level to providing the most appropriate learning resources that matches the student's learning needs, style and learning pathway. So in this regard, our platform is unique and we haven't seen either an eLearning or online education platform that offers AI to resolve the current education problems â€“ FYI, (a) Difficulty to track the student's progress or improvements as frequently as required; (b) Education is tailored to the average student rather than the individual; (c) it's hard to provide personalized feedback timely and in a focused way.  3. Our scholarship issued by our GoGreenFund targets low-income students or students with financial difficulty and will contribute to enhancing the equal affordability of high-quality education as these scholarship recipients can use the tokens to purchase tutoring services or AI products on our platform. As portion of our transaction fee will be contributed to the GoGreenFund to fund its operations, users are actually contributing to equal learning opportunities while making every purchase on our platform. And this is what we truly like about the fund's structure.  4. Our AI platform is perfectly integrated with our online tutoring platform. Although our AI applications will be crucial in realizing the ideal personalized learning eco system, we concluded that without connecting it to on-demand tutors, it's not perfect. Don't worry, she can easily utilize BitSchool's Dynamic Marking System that would partly or fully conduct the marking process on behalf of the teacher or she can connect with an on-demand tutor who is capable of helping her with the marking. As you can see, this connection will create the perfect education environment where the teacher is able to teach effectively and every student is able to get smart.  5. Every high-tech project has strong business experts and technologists. However, what differentiates us in terms of people is that we have dedicated teachers and student team members who are united around the same goal to create the best education environment where teachers can teach effectively and where no student is left behind. These teachers and students team members are the main sources that allow us to breathe educational reality into our design, development and deployment of our products and services, and ultimately build systems and services that are truly matching the needs of all education participants such as teachers, tutors, students and parents.  Umâ€¦you raised a very good question and it allowed me to think profoundly. Thanks a lot as I know this kind of question can only be raised out of serious interest, and we appreciate you for that. Body: Hi BlockFolksQ,  Please find my answers to your questions:  (Q) What is making me think more is that the ICO seems to focus on AI technology and how to integrate that into the education system. (A) Yep youâ€™re partly right, however, itâ€™s not only AI tech, but also tutoring. Like I envisaged in my earlier response, the on-demand tutoring service will form a crucial part in realizing personalized learning. We actually also have plans to integrate location-based tutoring which will allow instant meetups to resolve spontaneous learning needs on an one-on-one basis. The Assessment tool will accurately evaluate the studentâ€™s proficiency level per topics and sub topics, and the PLC will present the results i.e strength and weaknesses. However, our Dynamic Marking System, which will help teachers with their marking process, will be initially an Automation, but as the computer learns the teachersâ€™ marking habits, patterns, behavior and etc, itâ€™ll get sufficiently intelligent so that it could actually conduct the marking by itself on behalf of the teacher. So the Dynamic Marking is more targeting to make the teacherâ€™s job more effective but it also has an individualization aspect by its ability to generate appropriate feedbacks to students. However, this part will not be available initially and will be developed by our AI technologists. And our goal is to train the computer to the point that it could actually mark and provide feedbacks to very complicated and creative tasks such as essays. Also our Adaptive Video Technology will be used for personalizing learning as it will be able to present learning videos that matches the studentâ€™s learning needs and style. So as you can see, to us, actually the automation and individualization is quite clearly divided.  (Q) Overall, school is more about teaching as a group and it is quite hard to craft individual materials. That is why some families got tutors to help the students to learn better. However, it is very expensive to purely hire tutors for all the subjects. And these on-demand sessions in terms of service fees will be much cheaper than formal tutoring services that are usually performed over a length of time. However, there is still a chance that the learning needs of some students might not be handled through this process and in this case, they would be better off getting formal tutoring services. However, we believe that our system and the personalized learning environment we will create will cover the learning needs of most students. Title: ðŸš€[ANN] BITSCHOOL pre-ICO: Adaptive Artificial Intelligence eLearning PlatformðŸš€
Body: As you know from the whitepaper, we have already implemented an AI for the assessment section where it judges a students ability as they progress through a course. The AI then calculates a prediction of how that student should perform in future assessments and thus adjusts the difficulty of each question to ensure the student is both challenged and motivated throughout the course. This process is constantly re-calculated as the student progresses ensuring that the difficulty of the questions increases as the students knowledge also increases.  In the future we hope to utilise Natural Language Processing and machine learning along with CAFA's Automatic Item Generation (Our main partner currently) to spontaneously adapt a particular questions phrasing and answers in order to finely adjust the difficulty of that question. There is also plans to utilise all of the big data we will generate for exam answers in order to train a Deep Neural Network to be able to mark exam answers. However, there are lots of steps along the way towards this such as first training such a DNN to first identify trends in answers and to inform human assessors of these trends in order to speed up the marking process.  This is merely one of the areas that we are planning to use AI to improve education but there are many others which are all identified in the whitepaper.  I hope this has elaborated more on our end goals of the AI platform.
